alert.note: Alert for White Pine County (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued February 20 at 11:52AM PST until February 22 at 4:00PM PST by NWS Elko
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 1 PM TUESDAY TO 4 PM PST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 4 to 10 inches in the valleys and 10 to 15 inches in the mountains. Winds gusting as high as 50 mph. * WHERE...White Pine County. * WHEN...From 1 PM Tuesday to 4 PM PST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Patchy blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute. Gusty winds could bring down tree branches.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
